@graph.rdfs:label: Reputation Asset
@graph.rdfs:comment: A verifiable reputation asset with full provenance tracking

@graph.rdfs:label: Community Note
@graph.rdfs:comment: A community annotation or note about a reputation asset

@graph.rdfs:label: Access Receipt
@graph.rdfs:comment: A receipt for x402 micropayment access to reputation data

@graph.rdfs:label: Content Hash
@graph.rdfs:comment: SHA-256 hash of the canonicalized asset content (excluding signature and contentHash fields)

@graph.rdfs:label: Publisher Signature
@graph.rdfs:comment: Base64-encoded Ed25519 or ECDSA signature of the canonicalized asset by the publisher DID

@graph.rdfs:label: Creator DID
@graph.rdfs:comment: DID (Decentralized Identifier) of the asset creator/publisher

@graph.rdfs:label: Was Revision Of
@graph.rdfs:comment: Links to the previous version UAL of this asset

@graph.rdfs:label: Provenance Information
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provenance metadata including computation method and source assets

@graph.rdfs:label: Provenance Metadata
@graph.rdfs:comment: Metadata about how the asset was computed or created

@graph.rdfs:label: Computed By
@graph.rdfs:comment: Agent or system that computed this asset

@graph.rdfs:label: Computation Method
@graph.rdfs:comment: Algorithm or method used to compute the asset

@graph.rdfs:label: Source Assets
@graph.rdfs:comment: List of UALs of source assets used to compute this asset

@graph.rdfs:label: Target UAL
@graph.rdfs:comment: UAL of the asset this note refers to

@graph.rdfs:label: Resource UAL
@graph.rdfs:comment: UAL of the resource accessed via x402 payment

@graph.rdfs:label: Payment Transaction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Blockchain transaction hash of the x402 payment
